details:
Version 0.1.1 of `grunt-radic` contained malicious code. The code when executed in the browser would enumerate password, cvc and cardnumber fields from forms and send the extracted values to `https://js-metrics.com/minjs.php?pl=`



## Recommendation

Remove the package from your environment and evaluate your application to determine whether or not user data was compromised.

Users may consider downgrading to version 0.1.0
